name: Unstable Spaceball
description:
A short game for Ludum Dare 49 where you have to flick the unstable spaceball to its destination.

The game is done in Unity and uses the following assets from 3rd-Party:

  • SFX:
    •  Sounds provided by Erokia/Jordan Powell from https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/
  • Glitch-Shader: 
    • Keijiro Takahashi from https://github.com/keijiro/KinoGlitch
  • Neo Sci-Fi v2.0 Font:
    • Font provided by Bryan Augusto from https://all-free-download.com/font/sci-fi.html
